ygData.subject: Re: [sg-everquest] VP
ygData.msgSnippet: Think the 3rd named dragon s room has a portal out. No gate will work in there. But there s other ways to get out from VP. Just need some creative thinking.
ygData.messageBody:
Think the 3rd named dragon's room has a portal out. No gate will work in
there. But there's other ways to get out from VP. Just need some creative
thinking.
----- Original Message -----
From: "Alex Tan" <atan@...>
To: <sg-everquest@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, January 17, 2001 7:41 PM
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] VP


> Thanks Gary for the *scary details.......
>
> And I think I wouldnt want to go play with these mobs at this point of
time,
> cause I will just die in single attac, hehe
>
> Further more, if I remember correctly, there is no gate, no TP in VP??
> (correct me if I am wrong)
>
> /hide skip back and I will go lvl first.....
>
> Tiffa Dancinsword
> Lvl 55 Beguiler from Divine Grace
> Erolissi Marrs
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Gary Qui Hong Loong" <kanglun@...>
> To: <sg-everquest@egroups.com>
> Sent: Wednesday, January 17, 2001 7:05 PM
> Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] VP
>
>
> > As tough as Naggy/Vox....
> >
> > Some example of the yardtrash tat's around VP b4 u reached the named
> > dragons....
> >
> > Guardian Wurms
> > Version 1 : On Death, it splits into 2 dragons which are the exact
> clone
> > of Naggy and Vox.
> > Version 2 : No magic, no ae. Only pure melee power. Double hits for
> > 1400.
> > Version 3 : Double Hits for 650. Proc Resistable DT.
> > Version 4 : Double Hits for 650. Proc Reality Warp (port u to zone
in
> > from anywhere in VP)
> >
> > Raptors like mob : Think Scarlings with muscle...
> >
> > Chrome Drakes : Think Wizzie Mob.
> >
> > Tat's all I can remember offhand.
>
>
>
> Singapore Everquest Players List
